    • redisToRecords

      public static java.util.Vector<TimeRecord> redisToRecords​(java.util.Vector<TimeRecord> records, java.lang.String tag, java.lang.String id, boolean containsTargets)
      Replace the values of the record by the new ones retrieved from Redis IMPORTANT: records must preserve the order
      Parameters:
      tag - (extra info to id)
      id -
      containsTargets - true if data retrieved from Redis contains the targets (which are stored in the records), false otherwise
      Returns:
      the vector of time records corresponding to the key

    • retrieveOutput

      public static java.util.Vector<TimeRecord> retrieveOutput​(java.util.Vector<TimeRecord> records, java.lang.String id)
      Method that gets back the data stored in Redis IMPORTANT: records must preserve the order
      Parameters:
      records - Current time records vector
      tag - (extra info to id)
      id -
      Returns:
      Vector of time records updated with redis values corresponding to the key
